group2.shah.mili.zuhlke.matt.emoviecon

Class TheMovieDBWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • group2.shah.mili.zuhlke.matt.emoviecon.TheMovieDBWrapper

  • public class TheMovieDBWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper class that interfaces with TheMovieDB all calls and parsing should come from this class
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matt Zuhlke, Mili Shah

    • Method Detail

      • getBackdrops

        public static java.util.ArrayList<android.graphics.Bitmap> getBackdrops(int id)
        Requests, gets and sets the backdrops for a particular movie. Calls getMvoiePostBitMap to actually get the file from the built string.
        Parameters:
        id - movie id to search TheMovieDB on
        Returns:
        ArrayList an array list of bitmaps (backdrops) that were found for the movie

      • getMoviePostBitMap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap getMoviePostBitMap(java.net.URL photoURL)
        Gets an image for a movie. For both posters and backdrops
        Parameters:
        photoURL - URL built as a request for the exact picture to be pulled
        Returns:
        Bitmap picture that was found and returned

      • getNowPlayingMovies

        Returns:
        List List for upcoming Movies

      • getYouTubeLinks

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> getYouTubeLinks(int id)
        Gets and builds the YouTube links to display as related videos. Also sends back the name of the video to identify it.
        Parameters:
        id - movie id to search videos on
        Returns:
        ArrayList> An arraylist of arraylists the inner array list has the name and the url while the outter array lists holds multiple instances of these two variables

      • grabMovies

        private static java.util.List<EMovieCon> grabMovies(java.lang.String url,
                                                    int maxPage)
        Gets movies from the JSON url call and sets the variables for EMovieCon accordingly. Returns them as a list.
        Parameters:
        url - JSON call to get a list of movies
        maxPage - The amount of pages to query on - 11+ is maximum from the json string
        Returns:
        List a list of EMOvieCon instances with variables set

      • readAll

        private static java.lang.String readAll(java.io.Reader rd)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Reads all of the data from the reader and builds a json string
        Parameters:
        rd - Buffered reader that is used to read data
        Returns:
        String built from the reader
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the reader does not read a line its expecting

      • readJsonFromUrl

        private static org.json.JSONObject readJsonFromUrl(java.lang.String url)
                                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                                   org.json.JSONException
        Reads the JSONObject from the supplied url. Creates a stream and calls readAll to actually perform the read.
        Parameters:
        url - String that is used to call which is created into a connection stream
        Returns:
        JSONObject newly created with the texted built from readAll
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the Intput stream could not be read
        org.json.JSONException - If the JSON string could not be made into an object

      • setNowPlayingMovies

        private static void setNowPlayingMovies(int maxPage)
        Gets and sets the Now Playing Movie List depending on the maximum amount of pages to query on.
        Parameters:
        maxPage - The amount of pages to query movie results on

      • setUpcomingMovies

        private static void setUpcomingMovies(int maxPage)
        Gets and sets the Upcoming Movie List depending on the maximum amount of pages to query on.
        Parameters:
        maxPage - The amount of pages to query movie results on

      • updateLists

        public static void updateLists(android.content.Context appContext)
        Updates all lists used. If more lists are added, they should be added here also to work as a one button update.
        Parameters:
        appContext - The application context to get the max pages to query on from the Shared preferences
